user.title: Google Family Link – Setup
user.description: Configure the Google Family Link integration. After clicking Submit, the integration will attempt to open an automated browser login (Chromium). If that is not available on your platform, you will be guided to enter your session cookies manually in the next step.

data_description.update_interval: How often to poll Google Family Link for device state changes (30–3600 s).
data_description.timeout: Maximum time to wait for a response from Google (10–120 s).

cookies.title: Paste Google Session Cookies
cookies.description:
Automated browser login is not available on this platform. Follow these steps to copy your session cookies manually:

1. Install a cookie-manager browser extension such as **[Cookie-Editor](https://cookie-editor.com/)** or **[EditThisCookie](https://www.editthiscookie.com/)** in Chrome or Edge.
2. Open **[families.google.com]({familylink_url})** and log in with the Google account that manages your Family Link family.
3. Once you see the Family Link dashboard, click the cookie-manager extension icon.
4. Choose **Export as JSON** (Cookie-Editor) or **Export** / clipboard icon (EditThisCookie).
5. Copy the exported JSON text and paste it into the field below.

data_description.cookies_json: Paste the full JSON cookie array exported from your browser's DevTools. The array must contain the Google authentication cookies (e.g. SID, HSID, SSID).

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate – Session Expired
reauth_confirm.description:
Your Google Family Link session has expired. Please copy fresh session cookies from **[families.google.com]({familylink_url})** and paste them below.

1. Install a cookie-manager browser extension such as **[Cookie-Editor](https://cookie-editor.com/)** or **[EditThisCookie](https://www.editthiscookie.com/)** in Chrome or Edge.
2. Open **[families.google.com]({familylink_url})** and log in to your Google account.
3. Click the cookie-manager extension icon and choose **Export as JSON**.
4. Paste the copied JSON below.

data_description.cookies_json: Paste the full JSON cookie array exported from your browser's DevTools.
